COMMUNITY SCHOOL DISTRICT: NON-DISCRIMINATION POLICY STATEMENT:
The Akron-Westfield Community School District offers Career and Technical Educational programs in the following service areas:
*Agricultural Education
*Business Education
*Health Occupations Education
*Industrial Technology Education

It is the policy of the Akron-Westfield Community School District not to illegally discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, disability, religion, creed, age (for employment), marital status (for programs), sexual orientation, gender identity and socioeconomic status (for programs) in its educational programs and its employment practices. There is a grievance procedure for processing complaints of discrimination. If you have questions or a grievance related to this policy please contact the district's Equity Coordinator:
Mr. Derek Briggs, 7-12 Principal; Email: dbriggs@akron-westfield.com;
850 Kerr Dr, Akron, IA 51001, Telephone: (712) span.data-emptytext: Akron-Westfield Community School District provides equal opportunity in its programs, activities, and employment
span.data-value:
AKRON-WESTFIELD COMMUNITY SCHOOL DISTRICT: NON-DISCRIMINATION POLICY STATEMENT: The Akron-Westfield Community School District offers Career and Technical Educational programs in the following service areas: *Agricultural Education *Business Education *Health Occupations Education *Industrial Technology Education
It is the policy of the Akron-Westfield Community School District not to illegally discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, disability, religion, creed, age (for employment), marital status (for programs), sexual orientation, gender identity and socioeconomic status (for programs) in its educational programs and its employment practices. There is a grievance procedure for processing complaints of discrimination. If you have questions or a grievance related to this policy please contact the district's Equity Coordinator: Mr. Derek Briggs, 7-12 Principal; Email: dbriggs@akron-westfield.com; 850 Kerr Dr, Akron, IA 51001, Telephone: (712) 568-2020

p.span:
AKRON-WESTFIELD COMMUNITY SCHOOL DISTRICT: NON-DISCRIMINATION POLICY STATEMENT: The Akron-Westfield Community School District offers Career and Technical Educational programs in the following service areas: *Agricultural Education *Business Education *Health Occupations Education *Industrial Technology Education
It is the policy of the Akron-Westfield Community School District not to illegally discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, disability, religion, creed, age (for employment), marital status (for programs), sexual orientation, gender identity and socioeconomic status (for programs) in its educational programs and its employment practices. There is a grievance procedure for processing complaints of discrimination. If you have questions or a grievance related to this policy please contact the district's Equity Coordinator: Mr. Derek Briggs, 7-12 Principal; Email: dbriggs@akron-westfield.com; 850 Kerr Dr, Akron, IA 51001, Telephone: (712) 568-2020

p.a: Website Hosting Solution Powered by SchoolBlocks

div.h3:
Welcome to the SchoolBlocks
self-guided tour!
div.p: The most common question we receive is, how is SchoolBlocks inspired by Pinterest? SchoolBlocks eliminates navigation bars and uses a block style layout that’s similar to Pinterest. It creates a unique and engaging browsing experience, optimizes for mobile and removes a lot of navigational complexity.
Please click on the red plus signs found on this page to learn more about specific features.

button.class: btn btn-default
btn sb-organization-color-element-bg

div.p: As an administrator, you will have the custom page editing tools auto-load. Just click ‘read more’ to access our advanced page editing tools.
This bar holds all content types. Click on the Admin button, click "add block", select a content type, add your content then insert the block into the page.
This icon appears when you have edit permissions. Hold your mouse down and move the block. You’ll see the page reorganize!
Each block type has a custom editing experience. Click the pencil on any block or view our help documentation to learn more about block types.
